THE BARCLAYS PREMIER LEAGUE

Football stories are hardly ever done by... i mean you could still remember when Mourinho called Wenger a specialist in failure and had a fighting session with him after a premier league game...or when Suarez dived in front of Moyes for speculating that he loves to dive or Adebayo running the entire length of the field
to celebrate scoring against Arsenal.... all these stories hardly pass by and we are here to give you moments you might have passed on and rewrite each moments so you can relive your favourite moments... on Thrillsports Blog
